description:
What's better than a single inflatable cot? Two inflatable cots. Lay them side-by-side for an elevated sleep for two, or stack them when you want to be extra high off the ground. The ultralight design is light enough for backpacking adventures, while still being durable enough to handle rough ground with confidence.

  • Welded TPU construction resists punctures
  • I-Beam air chambers are stable and provide a flat surface on uneven ground
  • Perimeter air chambers are larger to keep you in the centre
  • Dual-port valves for fast inflation and deflation
  • Welded exterior buckles for attaching accessories
  • Includes 2 inflatable cots, single-wide accessory cover, carry bag, inflation sack, and repair patches
name: Big Agnes Goosenest Double Decker Inflatable Cot - Unisex
